title: Easy highway access, Resident storage located on-site
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'MACOMB COUNTY WARREN APARTMENTS', 'Welcome to Harlo Apartments, where you’ll find affordable Macomb County Warren apartments nestled in a lush, manicured setting.', 'With one and two-bedroom floor plans available, we’re confident you’ll find a home to fall in love with.', 'Our desirable location is just minutes from chic downtown Royal Oak with numerous high-end boutiques, over 70 restaurants, breweries, theaters and family-friendly entertainment.', 'The ability to easily hop on I-75 and I-696 makes Harlo Apartments an ideal home for employees of the GM Tech Center, Hewlett Packard and Chrysler.', 'Families will appreciate our close proximity to Wilkerson Elementary School, Carter Middle School and Warren Mott High School, while older students have an easy commute to Macomb Community College.', 'We encourage you to visit and see for yourself just how much Harlo Apartments has to offer, including our unique 24-hour service guarantee.', 'Call to set up a private tour today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 12', 'OR Text', '12', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 1,000 square feet', '- Red brick buildings and traditional architecture', '- Functionally designed kitchen featuring maple cabinetry and gas range', '- Updated lighting throughout the apartment home', '- Resident storage located on-site', '- Spacious living room, dining room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet', '- Dishwasher available in select homes', '- Large picture windows allow floods of natural sunlight', '- Controlled building access', 'Community Amenities', '- Beautifully landscaped grounds and courtyards', '- Near shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues', '- Open parking throughout the community, carports coming soon!', '- On-line resident portal (see Resident Services tab)', '- Pet friendly', '- Professionally equipped exercise room with flat screen televisions', '- Easy highway access', '- On-site maintenance with a 24-Hour Maintenance Response Guarantee', '- On-site management', '- Common laundry room with full size washer and dryer', '- Outdoor swimming pool with expansive pool deck', 'Pet Policy', 'Harlo Apartments offers pet friendly apartments in Warren and welcomes both cats and dogs.', 'You will find beautiful green spaces where your pet dog can run and play.', 'We are one the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog!', 'We have a limit of two pets under 35 lbs.', 'each.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'We are confident your pet will love living at Harlo as much as your human neighbors do!', 'Income Requirements:', 'Recent 30 days of pay stubs to meet 2.5 times the rent', 'Driving Directions', 'located on the west side of Mound Road, in between 13 mile and 14 mile.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Harlo Apartments', '31499 Mound Road, Warren, MI, 48092', 'oob44YI1']
